stopped_writing: You stopped writing for more than 12 seconds. This mechanism is intended for you to not think, just write. There is no right or wrong here.
wallet_not_recognized: Your wallet is not recognized. Please log out and log in again.
beta_app_warning: This app is in BETA, and there may be errors. Hang on, we are working to fix everything.
not_logged_in_warning: Heads up: you are not logged in.
error_uploading_session: There was an error uploading your session. Please let us know asap in order to fix it.
congratulations: Congratulations. The invitation is to remain in the awareness of this prompt today.
